# attributedString(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a new attributed string for the text element.

## Declaration

```swift
func attributedString(for textElement: NSTextElement) -> NSAttributedString?
```

## Parameters

- **textElement**: The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextElement] to map into an attributed string.

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString], or `nil`.

## Discussion

Returns `nil` if the method can’t map `textElement` to an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString].

## Managing text elements

- **textElement(for:)**: Returns the text element corresponding to object’s attributed string.
